QAData.question: Who won between Newcastle United and Crystal Palace on Wed, 20 Apr 2022 18:45:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Newcastle United won 1–0 over Crystal Palace on Wed, 20 Apr 2022 18:45:00 GMT.
